c74object.name: hoa.2d.decoder~
c74object.description: hoa.2d.decoder~ decodes an ambisonics soundfield for several loudspeakers configuration or for headphones. First argument is the ambisonic order of decomposition.

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

objarg.name: decomposition-order
objarg.description: First argument is the ambisonic order of decomposition.

method.name: signal
method.digest: Array of circular harmonic signals to decode for an array of loudspeakers
method.description: Array of circular harmonic signals to decode for an array of loudspeakers

attribute.name: angles
attribute.description: Angles of each channels. The angles of channels are only settable in irregular mode. Each angle are in degrees and is wrapped between 0. and 360. So you can also set an angle with a negative value. ex : angles for a 5.1 loudspeakers restitution system can be setted either by the "angles 0 30 110 250 330" or by "angles 0 30 110 -110 -30".

attribute.name: autoconnect
attribute.description: If the autoconnect attribute is checked, connected objects like the hoa.2d.meter~, hoa.2d.vector~, hoa.dac~ or hoa.gain~ will be notified of changes and adapt their behavior accordingly.

attribute.name: channels
attribute.description: The number of Channels. NB : in ambisonic mode, the number of channels must be equal or higher to the number of harmonics : (order *2 + 1), (default : order * 2 + 2).

attribute.name: crop
attribute.description: The crop attribute can be used in binaural mode to reduce the CPU usage by cropping the impulse responses (between 0 and 512) 0 means no crop

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description:
There is three decoding mode :
- regular : for a regular loudspeakers repartition over a circular array.
- irregular : for an irregular loudspeakers repartition over a circular array.
- binaural : for headphones.

attribute.name: offset
attribute.description: The offset of channels, in degrees between 0. and 360.
